opengraph.title: Vaccine Pandemic Targets the Innocent
opengraph.description: Ken Anton argues that vaccines are administered for profit  regardless of the harm they do. See a mother's testimony below in First Comment:by Ken Anton (henrymakow.com)During the last 30 years, the number of vaccines given to babies has quadrupled to over 40, and rising to over 70 by school age.
